name: BarbieYouCanBeAnything
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: barbie
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You’re invited to the Barbie: You Can Be Anything Game! Speak to Barbie and explore her many careers on Alexa. Help animals at the Pet Vet Clinic, go on outer space missions as an Astronaut, and make goals as a Soccer player.

Barbie is always eager to meet new friends and she can’t wait to hear from you. Just say, “Alexa, open Barbie” to start.

You can subscribe to Barbie Plus to unlock the full game*. Barbie Plus Members can play more careers, more sports, and more activities. Barbie Plus is also available as part of Amazon Kids+. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Barbie: You Can Be Anything skill is for kids and fans aged 6+.

This skill requires Alexa’s parental consent by an adult in the household (if not already granted). Visit https://www.amazon.com/myh/vpc/intro?clientId=Alexa_rw_vpc to give consent through your Amazon account. 

*Voice purchase settings are available in your Alexa App. 

NOTE: Disabling the skill will cause you to lose your game progress. 

Play Barbie: You Can Be Anything on Echo, Echo Show, and many other Alexa enabled devices. Please note: FireTV devices are not currently supported
